title: Ep 91: We go Full GOBLIN MODE
description:
In This Episode: Christian tries his absolute best to keep us on schedule while reading some stories about, a person getting caught going Goblin Mode, a mother in law wants to know if they are the A-hole for trying to throw a party for her new grandson, a Listener wants to know if they are the A-hole for refusing to buy dinner for her mother in law, and finally a wife finds her husband has been collecting sealed jars of..... Also for this weeks Circle Jerdge we go over some of the internets HOTTEST takes. 
Get Judgies Merch Here: https://www.bonfire.com/store/the-judgies-podcast/ 
Our Patreon is officially open, if you want to see extra content go check it out! https://www.patreon.com/JudgiesPod 
Send us mail! (Addressed However You'd Like) P.O. Box 58 Ottawa, IL 61350 
Leave a Review! https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-judgies/id1519741238 
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/judgiespod Follow us on 
Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod 
Intro Music by: Iván https://open.spotify.com/artist/5gB2VvyqfnOlNv37PHKRNJ?si=f6TIYrLITkG2NZXGLm_Y-Q&dl_branch=1 
#Judgies #GoblinMode #AITA
